page.title: 16Removals
page.content: In 1928 Mr Eldridge bought a haulage business.He had one container.In 1968 Mr Eldridge sold the haulage business and went into removals.There are five other people as well as Mr Eldridge.They work from seven thirty a.m.till five o'clock p.m.from Monday to Friday.Most people move if they're too old to live by themselves,if their house is too small or too big.They are better paid than they used to be.They are not allowed to travel more than twelve hours per house removal because the driver gets too tired to drive any further.
